channel.title: Multiple coding questions
channel.description:
1. How do I make Ancient Smoke Spells Work + Poison? 2. How do I edit how much Dmg spells do? 3. How do I make Ice Barrage Multi Target? 4. How do I add specials (Include how to add the bar)? 5. How do I make it auto-unequip certain items when in the wilderness? 6. What file do you edit the emote tabs in? 7. How do I make the Trade Screen work!? It always changes items you offer into Varrock Armour! DL the source and have a look! 8. How do you stop SYI Pker bots, Nulls and having symbols in the username!? 9. Changing PK timer, making it so attacks only hit every 3 seconds. With mine, hits come right wen you click :\ 10. Get rid of chat filter
Thanks :)
PS: This server is FunScap3 Based.[br][size=1]Posted on: October 08, 2007, 12:42:16 AM[/size][hr]Surely it aint that hard!

item.title: Multiple coding questions
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“krixus, post:8, topic:150203”]But they teach me about them, etc, but not what to do to do those things.

I don’t know any of the cases or anything which bring up those things or whatever.

I don’t even know those animations or anything.

And I can’t be stuffed to

AND my server wants and needs these updates.

Everyone is pestering me like mad![/quote]

That’s completely wrong. They teach you how to use switch statements, which deal with cases. They teach you everything you would need to know for what you’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple coding questions
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“krixus, post:6, topic:150203”]People give out the codes in the Tutorial Section so why not here!?

Answer that.

This is sort of asking for a tutorial.

I don’t reall need the exact code.

I just need someone to help me to do those things. Tell me what and where I should edit.

Or tell me what I’d need to add.[/quote]

If you learn from those java tutorials, I wouldn’t even need to tell you what to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Multiple coding questions
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

[quote=“krixus, post:3, topic:150203”][quote author=zoltanman link=topic=205712.msg1810933#msg1810933 date=1191846232]
I can already tell you want the codes handed to you, which wont happen. So what I can do for you is let you learn, and read the java tutorials. So you are then able to make your own.

So reading these tutorials, should get you where you need to start programming.

http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/java/index.html
[/quote]

Yes but I don’t understand what the different RuneScape case things are and all.

SECONDLY I haven’t got much time to get this done. My server users are expecting an update

THIRDLY I am to lazy :\

FOURTHLY, people do just give you the C+P codes.[/quote]

That’s why people make fun of moparscape right there. People on here are way too lazy, they don’t care about java, they don’t care about learning.

Read full topic
